definition[0]: used before giving more details or being more exact about something
example[0]: They, that’s to say Matt and John, were arguing about what to do.
definition[1]: used to give more exact information about something or to correct a statement
example[1]: One solution would be to change the shape of the screen, that is, to make it wider.
example[2]: Languages are taught by the direct method, that is to say, without using the student’s own language.
example[3]: I loved him – that is, I thought I did.
